Title: If These Walls Could Talk 2
Director: Jane Anderson, Martha Coolidge, Anne Heche
Writer: Jane Anderson, Sylvia Sichel (teleplay), Sylvia Sichel (story), Alex Sichel (story), Anne Heche, Earl W. Wallace (Created by)
Actors: Vanessa Redgrave, Marian Seldes, Paul Giamatti, Elizabeth Perkins
Plot: Semi-follow up of the first "If These Walls Could Talk" with three segments set in the same house, but with different occupants which spans nearly 40 years. While the first film delt with women and the topic of abortion, this deals with women and the topic of lesbianism.
Awards: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 6 wins & 10 nominations.
